        public IndentedPrintWriter​(Writer out)

      • IndentedPrintWriter

        public IndentedPrintWriter​(Writer out,
                           boolean autoFlush)
        Creates a new IndentedPrintWriter.
        Parameters:
        out - A character-output stream
        autoFlush - A boolean; if true, the println, printf, or format methods will flush the output buffer

        Increases the indentation level

        public void dedent()
        Decreases the indentation level

      • of

        public static IndentedPrintWriter of​(PrintWriter writer)
        Wraps the given writer in a indenting one if it isn't one already. Otherwise, returns the same one (casted).
